description: Try our easy to follow Melt 'N' Cheesy Grilled Flatbread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,May 2020,Microwave,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Jun 2020,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Melt 'N' Cheesy Grilled Flatbread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup plain flour (plus extra for dusting)

recipeInstructions.text: Place milk and butter in a small bowl and microwave on high for1 minute or until butter has melted. Transfer to a food processor. Add flour, yeast, extra virgin olive oil, sugar and salt flakes and process for 2 minutes or until a dough forms. Turn out into a lightly oiled bowl, then cover and prove for 1 hour or until doubled in size.
Meanwhile, combine cheeses, herbs and egg in a bowl. Season.
Divide dough into six pieces. On a lightly floured surface, roll out each piece to a 20cm round. Place 1/3 cup cheese mixture in centre of each round, gather edges to enclose, then flatten.

Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line baking tray with baking paper. Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat. Add 1 tbs olive oil and half theflatbreads and cook for 4 minutes on each side or until golden. Repeat with remaining oil and bread.
Transfer flatbread to tray and bake for 10 minutes or until dough is cooked through. Season and serve with lemon wedges.
